about_the_game:
★What is Two Realm Pack?★


With this pack, you can sign a contract with all 'Champion' and 'Trooper' from both Creaea and Aillai. Plus, 'Champions' and 'Troopers' you signed through this pack can be used right out-of-the-box regardless of your current Realm level. Consequently, you will get back all Blue & Red which you had spent to acquire Troopers and Champions individually before you purchased this pack!

★Features★


  • Provides access to every 'Champion' and 'Trooper' from both Creaea and Aillai.
  • Every current 'Champions' and 'Troopers' can be used right out-of-the-box regardless of your current player level.
  • Provide 8,000 Blue / Red
    (Aillai : 8,000 Blue / Creaea : 8,000 Red)
  • Get back all Blue and Red you had spent to acquire Troopers and Champions individually before you purchased this pack.
  • You can purchase this pack only once per account.
detailed_description:
★What is Two Realm Pack?★


With this pack, you can sign a contract with all 'Champion' and 'Trooper' from both Creaea and Aillai. Plus, 'Champions' and 'Troopers' you signed through this pack can be used right out-of-the-box regardless of your current Realm level. Consequently, you will get back all Blue & Red which you had spent to acquire Troopers and Champions individually before you purchased this pack!

★Features★


  • Provides access to every 'Champion' and 'Trooper' from both Creaea and Aillai.
  • Every current 'Champions' and 'Troopers' can be used right out-of-the-box regardless of your current player level.
  • Provide 8,000 Blue / Red
    (Aillai : 8,000 Blue / Creaea : 8,000 Red)
  • Get back all Blue and Red you had spent to acquire Troopers and Champions individually before you purchased this pack.
  • You can purchase this pack only once per account.

name: MINImax Tinyverse - Two Realms Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvdia GeForce GTX 8800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In every war the most brilliant strategists have always had their best soldiers, and this would be no exception in the war of Tinyverse!With this pack, you will have a chance to unleash your brilliant and unique strategies with both Creaea and Aillai!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
